pages.text: The concept core is crafted with a space crystal. To use the concept core, you need an $(l:io_tools/interoperation_wand)Interoperation Wand$() or a $(l:io_tools/world_interoperator)World Interoperator$() machine.
Per using the concept core, you need to wait until it has cooled down. The cooling down time limit differs from each concept core.
The effect of each concept core can be learned from other entries.
